column2: Choose a patron deity
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Corellon Larethian, god of elves, magic and warfare.
Sehanine Moonbow, goddess of the moon and death.
Hanali Celanil, goddes of love and beauty.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Labelas Enoreth, god of time and history.
Rillifane Rallathil, god of nature and woodlands.
Fenmarel Mestarine, god of outcasts and isolation.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Aerdrie Faenya, goddess of wind and weather.
Shevarash, god of vengeance and loss.
Solonor Thelandira, god of hunting and archery.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
[Root.MielikkiLoc], goddess of forest creatures and rangers.
[Root.LurueLoc], goddess of unicorns and pegasi.
